articles.title: Oppo’s Find X5 Pro flagship is finally official - The Verge
articles.description: Oppo has announced its latest flagship phone, the Find X5 Pro. It’s the company’s highest-end device yet, with the specs you’d expect from a 2022 flagship.
articles.content: After extensive leaks and teases, Oppo has officially announced the Find X5 Pro, its flagship phone for 2022. Its a fairly iterative follow-up to last years Find X3 Pro, but that was a great phone, a… [+2183 chars]
